H0.text: who built the first temple for god in jerusalem. David

H1.text: who built the first temple for god in jerusalem. Abraham

H2.text: who built the first temple for god in jerusalem. Moses

H3.text: who built the first temple for god in jerusalem. Solomon

A4.text: The Hebrew Bible, specifically within the Book of Kings, includes a detailed narrative about the construction's ordering by Solomon, the penultimate ruler of the United Kingdom of Israel.

A5.text: Schmid and Rupprecht are of the view that the site of the temple used to be a Jebusite shrine that Solomon chose in an attempt to unify the Jebusites and Israelites.
